alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:22PM CDT until July 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Northwestern Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Northeastern Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 521 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located from near Warren to near Hampton to near Hopeville. These storms are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Warren... Hampton... Thornton... Harrell... Weeks... Ellisville... Harlow... Hampton Municipal Airport... Lanark... Banks... Tinsman... Chambersville... Farmville... Hopeville... Woodberry... New Edinburg... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
